name: Modules.LDAP.Entry
summary: Provides access to the entry object retrieved from a call to firstEntry or nextEntry.

methods.name: firstAttribute
methods.summary: Retrieves the name of the first attribute for the entry. Returns null if there are no attributes.

methods.name: getDn
methods.summary: Retrieves the DN for this search entry

methods.name: getValues
methods.summary: Retrieves an array of string values for the specified attribute. Returns null if there are no values.

parameters.name: name
parameters.summary: The name of the attribute to retrieve

methods.name: getValuesLen
methods.summary: Retrieves an array of Titanium.Blob values for the specified attribute. This method should be used when the attribute values are binary in nature and not suitable to be returned as an array of strings. Returns null if there are no values.

parameters.name: name
parameters.summary: The name of the attribute to retrieve

methods.name: nextAttribute
methods.summary: Retrieves the name of the next attribute for the entry (and advances the pointer/cursor). Returns null if there are no more attributes.
